attributes.action: Allow free rescheduling of flights to prevent further spread of Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: To discourage unnecessary travel to areas with high incidence of Covid-19 to help contain the spread.
attributes.background: Make airlines waive fees for rescheduling flights and holidays that have been booked to areas with high cases of Covid-19.

rejection.details:
Individual airlines are responsible for setting fees and making decisions about rescheduling flights.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to create a fund to reimburse people who have lost money because they have cancelled plans due to coronavirus.
